00057 #include <stdio.h>
00058 #include <stdlib.h>             // for atof()
00059 #include "mscb.h"
00060 
00061 extern bit FREEZE_MODE;
00062 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;
00063 
00064 char code node_name[] = "SCS-210";
00065 
00066 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00067 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00068 
00069 bit terminal_mode, output_flag;
00070 unsigned char n_in;
00071 
00072 /*---- Define channels and configuration parameters returned to
00073        the CMD_GET_INFO command                                 ----*/
00074 
00075 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00076 
00077 struct {
00078    char output[32];
00079    char input[32];
00080    unsigned char baud;
00081 } xdata user_data;
00082 
00083 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00084    1,   UNIT_ASCII,  0, 0, MSCBF_DATALESS, "RS232", 0,
00085    32,  UNIT_STRING, 0, 0,              0, "Output", &user_data.output[0],
00086    32,  UNIT_STRING, 0, 0,              0, "Input", &user_data.input[0],
00087    1,   UNIT_BAUD,   0, 0,              0, "Baud", &user_data.baud,
00088    0
00089 };

00091 /********************************************************************\
00092 
00093   Application specific init and inout/output routines
00094 
00095 \********************************************************************/
00096 
00097 void user_write(unsigned char channel) reentrant;
00098 void write_gain(void);
00099 
00100 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00101 
00102 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00103 {
00104    /* initialize UART1 */
00105    if (init)
00106       user_data.baud = 1;       // 9600 by default
00107 
00108    uart_init(1, user_data.baud);
00109 }
00110 
00111 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00112 
00113 /* buffers in mscbmain.c */
00114 extern unsigned char xdata in_buf[300], out_buf[300];
00115 
00116 #pragma NOAREGS
00117 
00118 char idata obuf[8];
00119 
00120 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00121 {
00122    unsigned char i, n;
00123 
00124    /* manage terminal functions */
00125    if (index == 0) {
00126       if (in_buf[2] == 27)
00127          terminal_mode = 0;
00128       else if (in_buf[2] == 0)
00129          terminal_mode = 1;
00130       else {
00131          n = (in_buf[0] & 0x07) - 1;
00132          for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00133             putchar(in_buf[i + 2]);
00134       }
00135    }
00136 
00137    if (index == 1) 
00138       output_flag = 1;
00139 
00140    if (index == 3)
00141       uart_init(1, user_data.baud);
00142 }
00143 
00144 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00145 
00146 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char channel)
00147 {
00148    char c;
00149 
00150    if (channel == 0) {
00151       c = getchar_nowait();
00152       if (c != -1) {
00153          out_buf[1] = c;
00154          return 1;
00155       }
00156    }
00157 
00158    return 0;
00159 }
00160 
00161 /*---- User write config function ----------------------------------*/
00162 
00163 void user_write_conf(unsigned char channel) reentrant
00164 {
00165    if (channel == 0)
00166       uart_init(1, user_data.baud);
00167 }
00168 
00169 /*---- User read config function -----------------------------------*/
00170 
00171 void user_read_conf(unsigned char channel)
00172 {
00173    if (channel);
00174 }
00175 
00176 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00177 
00178 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00179 {
00180    /* echo input data */
00181    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00182    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00183    return 2;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00187 
00188 /* external watchdog */
00189 sbit EWD = P0 ^ 6;
00190 
00191 void user_loop(void)
00192 {
00193    char c;
00194    unsigned char i;
00195 
00196    if (output_flag)
00197       {
00198       output_flag = 0;
00199       
00200       /* delete input string */
00201       n_in = 0;
00202       for (i=0 ; i<32 ; i++)
00203          user_data.input[i] = 0;
00204 
00205       /* send output string */
00206       for (i=0 ; i<32 ; i++) {
00207          if (!user_data.output[i])
00208             break;
00209          putchar(user_data.output[i]);
00210          flush();
00211 
00212          /* delay for slow modules */
00213          delay_ms(10);
00214       }
00215    }
00216 
00217    if (!terminal_mode) {
00218       c = getchar_nowait();
00219       if (c != -1 && n_in < 32) {
00220          user_data.input[n_in++] = c;
00221          led_blink(1, 1, 50);
00222       }
00223    }
00224 
00225    /* toggle external watchdog */
00226    EWD = !EWD;
00227 }
